name: Vegan Fried Rice
description: This vegan fried rice with tofu makes such a great dinner recipe for busy weeknights. It's easy to make, packed with flavor, and ready in just 15 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 1  small broccoli, cut into small florets
1  red bell pepper, cut into small cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the sesame oil in a large pan and add the crumbled tofu. Cook for 3 minutes. Then add the turmeric and kala namak and stir well. Cook for about 20 seconds. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat the sesame oil in a large pan and add the crumbled tofu. Cook for 3 minutes. Then add the turmeric and kala namak and stir well. Cook for about 20 seconds. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pan, heat some more oil and add the carrots, bell pepper, peas, garlic, and 3 of the green onions. Season with salt and pepper and sauté for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same pan, heat some more oil and add the carrots, bell pepper, peas, garlic, and 3 of the green onions. Season with salt and pepper and sauté for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the broccoli and cook for another 3 minutes on high heat. Stir often.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the broccoli and cook for another 3 minutes on high heat. Stir often.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked rice, tofu, soy sauce, curry powder, and sesame oil. Cook for 2 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cooked rice, tofu, soy sauce, curry powder, and sesame oil. Cook for 2 more minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with the remaining green onion and serve immediately. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle with the remaining green onion and serve immediately. Enjoy!

keywords: fried rice without egg, vegan fried rice
